SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the main game logic, including object card and common goal management.
See Also:

    • addObjectCardsToShelf

      public boolean addObjectCardsToShelf(List<ObjectCard> limbo, int col)
      Method that adds a list of ObjectCards in the first available cells of the specified column.
      Parameters:
      col - is the column where to insert the object cards.
      Returns:
      true if the cards are successfully added.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if there is not enough space to add the cards.
